Summary: Star like, bright, visible to naked eye, moving from west to east slowly.
trends: There have been 97 other sightings in Miami

This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Details Star like object,at daylight time: 07:17pm. I first noticed it and though to be a plane coming straight at my direction, but it was moving slowly from west to east, in an straight line, it looks like it was below cloud level. I managed to record it using a Sony camcorder.
